title: George Soros’ Shocking New Plans (Ep 1820)
description:
In this episode, I address the shocking George Soros’ article about his future plans. 

News Picks:


Breaking: Nancy Pelosi reportedly will visit Taiwan.


Schumer-Manchin deal raises taxes on earners under $400K: study.


Read this story about TikTok, and the Hunter Biden story will make more sense.


Big Tech fact-checkers flag Biden "recession" definition change allegations as "false information.”

Sen. Ron Johnson expects 'deal' to conceal Hunter Biden indictment.



Rumble's antitrust lawsuit against Google will proceed to discovery.

In this episode, I address the shocking George Soros’ article about his future plans.

  • Read this story about TikTok, and the Hunter Biden story will make more sense.
  • Big Tech fact-checkers flag Biden "recession" definition change allegations as "false information.”
